svg.title: byGOG Lab - Logo
svg.desc: Modern, yalın logo: solda teknoloji baloncuklu monogram, sağda temiz yazı logosu.

text.style: fill:var(--fg);font:700 44px/1.1 system-ui,-apple-system,"Segoe UI",Roboto,"Helvetica Neue",Arial,"Noto Sans","Liberation Sans",sans-serif;letter-spacing:.2px
fill:var(--fg-muted);font:600 16px/1.2 system-ui,-apple-system,"Segoe UI",Roboto,"Helvetica Neue",Arial,"Noto Sans","Liberation Sans",sans-serif;letter-spacing:.3px
